chart_description: This chart displays the total CPU utilization across all cores in a Windows machine as a percentage. It indicates the overall load on the processor and can help identify potential bottlenecks.

dimension_descriptions.privileged: Percentage of CPU utilization attributed to privileged processes, which are executed with higher permissions and can directly access system resources.
dimension_descriptions.user: Percentage of CPU utilization attributed to user processes, which are executed with lower permissions and typically perform tasks related to user interaction or applications.
